summary: When his mother dies, a teenager takes a road-trip in a stolen car to find his long-lost brother. Along the way he discovers a profound connection with the car-owner and with himself as well.
cast: Lou Taylor Pucci|Zooey Deschanel|M. Ward|Judy Greer|Nick Offerman|Brian McNamara|Jena Malone|Erv Immeman|Ann Ryerson|Julio Oscar Mechoso|Alex Nicksay|Aaron Mitchel|Michael Patterson-Crohn|Marissa Ingrasci|Sita Young|William Lee Scott|Colin Fickes|Bill Duke|Maura Tierney|Jon 'Corn Mo' Cunningham|Jsu Garcia|Saul Huezo|John Anthony Delgado|Adam B Selzer|Patrick O'Driscoll|Paul Palo|Eliska Sursova
title: The Go-Getter
